title: vElai tandAlE
sahitya:
vElai tandAlE pOdum kUli vENDAmayyA vEda vana duraiyE un shOlaiyil


anupallavi

  kAlaik-kavi malarAl mAlai toDuttu shUTTik-kAdalA nin mukham kaNDu kaNDu kaLikkum


caraNam    jnAna shuDar vaDivai nAda vaDivezhudi navarasa niram tITTi nAthA un muDi kATTi 
mOna niciyinilE mOham koNDE pADi un muttu muruval kaNDu pittErik-kUttADum
